title.value: Endocrinology: Hypoglycemia Rule

display.value: Clinical Providers caring for adult patients
Adult (person)
Adult outpatient with an active problem of either diabetes mellitus, type 1 or type 2
Hospital-based outpatient department (environment)
Emergency Department (ED)
Inpatient hospital
Urgent care
Care and Management of the Diabetic Patient

title.value: Symptomatic Hypoglycemia
Primary Care: Symptopatic Hypglycemia

description.value: Patient Episode of Hypglycemia Alerts

Send a message to the independent practitioner saying, “Patient has had an episode of hypoglycemia. Assess hypoglycemia awareness, review management plan, and adjust medications and glycemic target range as appropriate.”

display.value: Send a message to the independent practitioner saying, “Patient has had an episode of hypoglycemia. Assess hypoglycemia awareness, review management plan, and adjust medications and glycemic target range as appropriate.”

description.value: Send a message to the pharmacist saying, “Patient has had an episode of hypoglycemia. Review prescriptions and dosing instructions with the patient to help ensure understanding of medication use.”

display.value: Send a message to the pharmacist saying, “Patient has had an episode of hypoglycemia. Review prescriptions and dosing instructions with the patient to help ensure understanding of medication use.”

description.value: Send a message to the care manager saying, “Patient has had an episode of hypoglycemia. Assess self-management adherence risks, understanding of action plan, hypoglycemia risk factors, and psychosocial barriers. Refer to services as needed.”

display.value: Send a message to the care manager saying, “Patient has had an episode of hypoglycemia. Assess self-management adherence risks, understanding of action plan, hypoglycemia risk factors, and psychosocial barriers. Refer to services as needed.”

description.value: Send a message to the certified diabetes educator saying, “Patient has had an episode of hypoglycemia. Address any identified self-management issues.”

display.value: Send a message to the certified diabetes educator saying, “Patient has had an episode of hypoglycemia. Address any identified self-management issues.”

description.value: Send a message to the dietitian saying, “Patient has had an episode of hypoglycemia. Address any identified nutritional issues.”

display.value: Send a message to the dietitian saying, “Patient has had an episode of hypoglycemia. Address any identified nutritional issues.”

description.value: Send a message to the social worker saying, “Patient has had an episode of hypoglycemia. Address any identified psychosocial barriers to care.”

display.value: Send a message to the social worker saying, “Patient has had an episode of hypoglycemia. Address any identified psychosocial barriers to care.”

description.value: Send a message to the care coordinator saying, “Patient has had an episode of hypoglycemia. Make sure that an urgent visit with the prescriber of their hypoglycemic medications is scheduled and completed.”

display.value: Send a message to the care coordinator saying, “Patient has had an episode of hypoglycemia. Make sure that an urgent visit with the prescriber of their hypoglycemic medications is scheduled and completed.”

description.value: Send a message to the patient saying, “Review your self-management plan, including what to do if you have low blood sugar. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact your care team.”

display.value: Send a message to the patient saying, “Review your self-management plan, including what to do if you have low blood sugar. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact your care team.”

description.value: Activate Documentation Template: Hypoglycemia KNART

display.value: Activate Documentation Template: Hypoglycemia KNART

description.value: Activate Order Set: Hypoglycemia KNART

display.value: Activate Order Set: Hypoglycemia KNART

title.value: Asymptomatic but at Risk for Hypoglycemia

description.value: Hypoglycemia Risk Alerts

Send a message to the clinical provider saying, “Patient is at risk for hypoglycemia. Assess hypoglycemia awareness, review management plan, and adjust medications and glycemic target range as appropriate.”

display.value: Send a message to the clinical provider saying, “Patient is at risk for hypoglycemia. Assess hypoglycemia awareness, review management plan, and adjust medications and glycemic target range as appropriate.”

description.value: Send a message to the pharmacist saying, “Patient is at risk for hypoglycemia. Review prescriptions and dosing instructions with the patient to help ensure understanding of medication use.”

description.value: Send a message to the care manager saying, “Patient is at risk for hypoglycemia. Assess self-management adherence risks, understanding of action plan, hypoglycemia risk factors, psychosocial barriers. Refer to services as needed.”

display.value: Send a message to the care manager saying, “Patient is at risk for hypoglycemia. Assess self-management adherence risks, understanding of action plan, hypoglycemia risk factors, psychosocial barriers. Refer to services as needed.”

description.value: Send a message to the certified diabetes educator saying, “Patient is at risk for hypoglycemia. Address any identified self-management issues.”

display.value: Send a message to the certified diabetes educator saying, “Patient is at risk for hypoglycemia. Address any identified self-management issues.”

description.value: Send a message to the dietitian saying, “Patient is at risk for hypoglycemia. Address any identified nutritional issues.”

display.value: Send a message to the dietitian saying, “Patient is at risk for hypoglycemia. Address any identified nutritional issues.”
